fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47992].
  {panel}

Using the Default Theme, Confluence Questions Layout renders in the expected way.
Here's an image showing the expected layout:
!Screenshot2.png|thumbnail!

After switching to the Confluence Documentation Theme, Confluence Questions Layout seems to break in the header, showing extra spaces on it.
Here's an image showing this difference:
!Screenshot1.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Confluence Question Layout is broken when using Confluence Documentation Theme.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47982].
  {panel}

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Ensure some questions exist in the system
# Create a Questions List Macro
# Select 'popular'
# Enter a topic which does not have any questions asked about it yet
# Observe that the Questions List contains other questions which do not contain the topic entered.
# Change the macro to 'recent'
# Observe that the macro now correctly displays 'No questions found'

h3. Workarounds
* Create some questions with that topic
* Use 'recent' or 'unanswered' in the macro, instead of 'popular'
fields.summary: Questions List Macro shows incorrect questions for the popular view, if the entered topic contains no questions yet.

  {panel}

Test environment: IE8

Steps

# Observe the side bar

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47970].
  {panel}

When trying to watch Topics, users can only see the actual watch/unwatch status of the first 12 items that are displayed.

If a user clicks on 'Watch' link of Topic 13 and up it seems to work fine. However, after refreshing the screen the 'Watch' link is displayed. See attachments for more details.

If the user enters on the topic he can see if he's either watching or not watching the Topic without problems. The issue is that it is not reflected on the Topics list page.

*Environment: Confluence OnDemand 5.6-OD-37-042, Confluence Questions 1.1.36*
fields.summary: Topics on a higher than 12th position are displayed as unwatched
Click area in code/image toolbar buttons too small

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47965].
  {panel}

On the new Answers site, I ran a search for mentions of our products or certain keywords and the search results returned are minimal, not covering content we know is there.  For instance:

- search "dataplane" -- one article is returned.  There are dozens of mentions across the old Answers.
- same with "arsenale' -- a dozen or so, but should be a lot more
- I was looking for these articles to come up in searching for "dataplane" and "arsenale" -- not included
-- https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/280249/how-can-i-generate-a-report-that-will-roll-up-time-estimates-for-linked-issues-and-the-issues-subtasks
-- https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/143647/estimates-not-rolling-up-to-parent

Thanks for looking into it.
fields.summary: On Answers, not all content appears to be indexed for searches

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47959].
  {panel}

We installed the Questions Add-on and created 4 topics in a space. We realized that the topics are available in all the space and we wanted to go live today but have disabled the add-on.
Is there a way to delete a topic? There has to be a way!
Will uninstalling the add-on remove everything and re-installing allow us to carefully design.
Are there things that need attention while uninstalling?
Could you please have a section called limitations and add such things for 1st time users

Thanks
Sri

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47955].
  {panel}

h3. Steps to reproduce
# Log into Confluence with an administrator (not system administrator) account.
# Remove all of the permissions from the Confluence Questions Permissions admin screen.

Once the admin user hits Save, they'll get a "You are not permitted to perform this operation" when the page reloads. From that point on it's impossible for a regular administrator to re-add the permissions, it has to be a system administrator. Given we don't grant customer accounts sysadmin privileges in OnDemand, this is problematic.
fields.summary: Unable to re-add permissions if all permissions is removed and user is an administrator (not sysadmin)

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47947].
  {panel}

CQ does not seem to be using clustered events when updating or adding a license to the plugin.

To replicate:

Current master of Confluence:
Run in cluster with two nodes
Install plugin on node1
Add license on node1 to be able to use CQ
Check upm on node2 plugin appears but is not active on the node even though it's showing up on upm.
fields.summary: Enable licensing update on CQ to have clustered events

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47945].
  {panel}

Expected behavior:
From a user information page in Questions, e.g., /questions/users?username=USERID ... I click on the "Contact Info" button then "View full profile". Should be taken to the user's Confluence profile page.

Actual behavior:
I still go to the same user information page that I was already on.
fields.summary: "View full profile" button doesn't go to user profile

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47944].
  {panel}

Creating a new question with no associated topics is permitted by the REST API (a 200 OK response is returned, and the question is created in the DB).

Creating a new question via the user interface requires that at least one topic should be selected.

If you try to view a question that was created via the API with no topics, a rendering error is thrown.

Either the UI should tolerate topic-less questions, or the API should reject topic-less questions before creating them.
fields.summary: REST API should not accept questions created with no topics

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47922].
  {panel}

DatabaseNameHelper will fail in Oracle with error {{ORA-01424: missing or illegal character following the escape character}} when there is some table with special characters in their name.

{noformat}
Caused by: org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException: ConnectionCallback; SQL []; ORA-01424: missing or illegal character following the escape character
; nested exception is java.sql.SQLDataException: ORA-01424: missing or illegal character following the escape character

	at org.springframework.jdbc.support.SQLExceptionSubclassTranslator.doTranslate(SQLExceptionSubclassTranslator.java:78)
	at org.springframework.jdbc.support.AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.translate(AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.java:72)
	at org.springframework.jdbc.support.AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.translate(AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.java:80)
	at org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate.execute(JdbcTemplate.java:349)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl$1.get(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:103)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl$1.get(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:96)
	at com.google.common.base.Suppliers$MemoizingSupplier.get(Suppliers.java:109)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl.getCaseSensitiveName(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:85)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl.getCaseSensitiveTableName(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:64)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.AbstractRelationalPathBase.<init>(AbstractRelationalPathBase.java:14)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.ContentTable.<init>(ContentTable.java:28)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.QueryDSLMapper$7.apply(QueryDSLMapper.java:69)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.QueryDSLMapper$7.apply(QueryDSLMapper.java:65)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.QueryDSLMapper.getMapping(QueryDSLMapper.java:50)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.internal.upgrade.DuplicatedAcceptedAnswersRemover.deleteDuplicatedAcceptedAnswers(DuplicatedAcceptedAnswersRemover.java:40)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.internal.upgrade.AnswerAcceptanceMigrationToAoUpgradeTask.upgrade(AnswerAcceptanceMigrationToAoUpgradeTask.java:66)
{noformat}

*Workaround:*

Uninstall version 1.0.618 and then install version 1.0.469, [available here|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions/versions].
fields.summary: DatabaseNameHelper failing in Oracle

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47906].
  {panel}

*Preconditions:*
* Create a question
* Leave 1 answer

*Steps *
* 1. Add "?page=2" to the end of the URL then press Enter key
* => It shows *paging*
* 2. Click Next
* => it shows ?page=3"
* 3. Click Next several times
* => it does not show "1" between Previous and Next links

*Expected:*
* It should not show paging until there are more than 4 answers (current number of answers per a page)
!CQ - paging.gif|thumbnail!

_Notes: You can view the .gif file by opening it in a broswer_

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47899].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce:
1. Post an answer to a question. In the answer, paste a URL which has an apostrophe in the URL, e.g. https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/Editing+or+Deleting+a+Page+That+Won't+Render
2. Save the answer. The URL alias will show the full URL.
3. Hover over or click the URL to check the target. Everything after the apostrophe will be removed.

Example: https://extranet.atlassian.com/questions/2343677488/answers/2344069866
fields.summary: When posting an answer to a question, URLs with apostrophe's are incorrectly truncated
In-line editing labels does not allow a label to be removed

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47894].
  {panel}

When we migrated to Confluence Questions form OSQA, we re-implemented the ability to earn and redeem stuff from the Atlassian Swag store.  The UI to redeem these items can be accessed from the user's own profile page in Confluence.  However, there's a few issues with this:

1) The URL is https://answers.atlassian.com/plugins/swag/myswag.action - not very memorable. We should consider aliasing it to something like "answers.atlassian.com/swag", like it was on the old system.

2) The Confluence user profile is buried pretty deep in Atlassian Answers due to the fact we're operating Confluence Questions in "standalone" mode.  It takes 2-3 clicks to find the swag UI from the Answers homepage.

3) Users aren't notified when they are eligible to claim new items of swag.  We need to rely on the user checking back regularly to know when they've earned something.
fields.summary: The Atlassian Swag store integration on Answers is not discoverable

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47879].
  {panel}

*Steps to reproduce:*
- Run CQ in standalone mode (disable Confluence Spaces plugin)
- Go to Global Permissions (the CQ version)
- Enable anonymous access to Confluence Questions
- Go to the root URL (eg. "http://localhost:1990/conlfuence")

*Expected Behaviour*
- The Confluence Questions index is displayed

*Actual Behaviour*
- The user is redirected to a login prompt

*Cause?*
This seems to happen because Confluence is still respecting the non-CQ, global anonymous usage permissions when accessing the root index of Confluence.  If you enable the Confluence Spaces plugin, go to global permissions and enable *Use Confluence* permissions for anonymous users, then it works as expected once the Confluence Spaces plugin is disabled again.
fields.summary: The root Confluence URL is not accessible to anonymous users in standalone mode, even when anonymous access is enabled
Vote state on question disappears after refresh

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47876].
  {panel}

Labels are essential for "helpers" such as plugin vendors to monitor for questions on their plugins.

The label selection dialog is largely useless as it stands because of all the cruft (see screenshot). Lots of people don't even know how to use labels, they just paste their question there, hence cruft.

The label suggestions should be sorted by popularity... this would cause natural clumping around one or two labels, rather than a distribution of between many. Perhaps even show the number of these labels in parens.

This distribution makes it impossible for me to watch all possible labels.

Not only that, the list is actually truncated with no indication that it's truncated. This makes it impossible for a user to find the correct label for my plugin, eg addon-com.onresolve.jira.groovy.groovyrunner.
fields.summary: labels in CQ version of AAC largely useless because of cruft

h4.Steps to Reproduce:
# Install CQ "1.0.618" or "1.0.618.001"
# Make sure that CQ does not have anonymous access
# Browse through Confluence as anonymous

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47832].
  {panel}

* Provision a new OD instance, using the default licence
* Note that CQ is not licenced
* Go the Admin Console
* There is a section in the console for "Confluence Questions" with a 'Configure' link.
* This goes to to /wiki/admin/questions/configure.action

This is confusing, as the customer cannot actually use CQ.
fields.summary: Customers see "Configure" option for CQ in OD even when it is not licenced

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-47831].
  {panel}

Users get the "Electric Charlie" screen when loading this question: https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/149631/sourcetree-for-linux

For one user, it doesn't work in Chrome but does work in Safari.  If the user loads the question anonymously in Chrome then it works.

I looked in the application log and couldn't find any relevant exception or error message.

Needs more investigation.
fields.summary: Some users are not able to view the "SourceTree for Linux" question on AAC when logged in and using Chrome
Styles overriding each other
